definitions.definition: Of a weapon, etc.: sharp-pointed; keen.

definitions.example: A poignant reply will garner more credence than hours of blown smoke.

definitions.definition: Evoking strong mental sensation, to the point of distress; emotionally moving.
definitions.example: Flipping through his high school yearbook evoked many a poignant memory of yesteryear.

definitions.definition: Of a smell or taste: piquant, pungent.
Of a look, or of words: incisive; penetrating; piercing.
definitions.example: His comments were poignant and witty.
